businessProfile.name: Papa Pasquale's Pizzeria
businessProfile.address: 521 Bullocks Point Ave, Riverside, RI 02915, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 521 Bullocks Point Ave, Riverside, RI 02915, USA

reviews.text:
Spectacular!

We ordered a Pepperoni and Hawai'ian 'za with a side of curly fries.

The food was hot, fresh, and ready very soon after. We picked it up soon after, because of how close we are. The people inside were very attentive and welcoming.

We got it home, and everything was exemplary. Crispy fries, spicy 'roni, and great cheese.
Definitely the best spice around, check out Papa Pasquale's!

Since being converted to a Papa lover I've visited quite a few times for lunch and dinner. The food is always delicious.

The reason it's lost a star since my last review is because even though I've twice paid for bacon on my sandwich, they continue to either put it on the wrong sandwich or not give it at all.

The longer this continues the further my rating will drop. Hopefully they can get their act together in the future. ü§ûüèæ

Decided to give this place a try tonight. Big mistake. Ordered a large cheese pizza for pickup, walked in to this janky shop that seemed to be half put together, only to find this clearly very miserable woman, and a man who was so stoned he seemed to be either on Mars or Pluto, I couldn't tell. But anyways, she comes over to the counter and asks my finace can I help you? Before I continue, every single time I have ordered a pizza in the 30 years of my existence, picking it up goes the same way. Walk in, say "i placed an order for pickup" and the waitress responds with either "what did you have?", "phone number?" Or "name?". Well the miserable, regretful waitress decides to do the hand rolling gesture to my fianc√© while making a face as if to make her seem stupid. A joke of an employee, and a joke of a pizza shop. The cheese is also clearly bagged and comes from a sysco truck. Years of working in a pizza shop where they use fresh ingredients and care about their customers is how I know. Save the 21 dollars for a cheese pizza and give it to a homeless man if you're considering ordering here. Now I see why they are bribing people with free food for a 5 star review. Most businesses earn their reviews. ü´°

I ordered a couple of foot long Turkey subs. They arrived and I lifted one up. I thought it was a joke. It felt like I was picking up an empty roll. I looked inside and there were two or three very small thinly sliced pieces of Turkey. Barely anything! Very disappointed. Skimping on the meat is not good. You just lost my business. Charged me $25 for sandwiches that likely only cost them $6 to make. You need to make people a REAL sandwich! That means at least 6 slices of Turkey. I think subway gives people 12 slices of Turkey for a foot long sub! Take a lesson from them. You should be embasrassed. Oh well, I overspent with you, but I'm getting my money back. I'll be saving hundreds of dollars by not ordering from you anymore in the future. I just threw your menu in the garbage as soon as I was done eating my roll. You screwed me by giving me close to en empty roll for a Turkey sandwich and now your wallet is going to be screwed by all the business you lose. You can't do that to customers because you will be the one to pay for it in the end when you go out of business!  Smarten up and do it right from now on!

I have ordered takeout from them several times. Their food is pretty good. They have a good variety of toppings for their gourmet pizzas and subs. Their prices are fair, and the best part is that they are the only shop in Riverside open till 2am in the morning! So if you get a craving for pizza or a sub late, you can get your fix from them! You can order online or on the phone, have it delivered or pickup, and your food will be fast and fresh. Their appetizers are pretty good, especially the combo appetizers. They have a big menu, and are family oriented

recentReviews.author: Pat McCarthy
recentReviews.text:
Spectacular!

We ordered a Pepperoni and Hawai'ian 'za with a side of curly fries.

The food was hot, fresh, and ready very soon after. We picked it up soon after, because of how close we are. The people inside were very attentive and welcoming.

We got it home, and everything was exemplary. Crispy fries, spicy 'roni, and great cheese.
Definitely the best spice around, check out Papa Pasquale's!

recentReviews.author: Brenden Chase
recentReviews.text:
Since being converted to a Papa lover I've visited quite a few times for lunch and dinner. The food is always delicious.

The reason it's lost a star since my last review is because even though I've twice paid for bacon on my sandwich, they continue to either put it on the wrong sandwich or not give it at all.

The longer this continues the further my rating will drop. Hopefully they can get their act together in the future. ü§ûüèæ

recentReviews.author: Samuel Seda
recentReviews.text: I have ordered takeout from them several times. Their food is pretty good. They have a good variety of toppings for their gourmet pizzas and subs. Their prices are fair, and the best part is that they are the only shop in Riverside open till 2am in the morning! So if you get a craving for pizza or a sub late, you can get your fix from them! You can order online or on the phone, have it delivered or pickup, and your food will be fast and fresh. Their appetizers are pretty good, especially the combo appetizers. They have a big menu, and are family oriented

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.4/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate the hot, fresh, and quickly prepared food, which enhances the dining experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant's late-night availability until 2am is a unique selling point in Riverside, catering to late-night cravings. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The variety of gourmet pizza and sub toppings is a standout feature that customers enjoy. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Incorrect or missing order items (e.g., bacon not added to sandwich) - review management can address this concern
Negative customer service experience (e.g., rude staff and poor pickup experience) - review management can address this concern
Perception of low-quality ingredients and value (e.g., insufficient meat on sandwiches) - social media marketing can improve this area

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
